title: Time vvell spent in sacred meditations. Divine observations. Heavenly exhortations Serving to confirme the penitent. Informe the ignorant. ... And, cherish the true-hearted Christian. By that late able, painfull, and worthy man of God, Mr. Ezechiel Culvervvel minister of the Word.
author: Culverwell, Ezekiel, 1553 or 4-1631.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by M. Flesher for H. Skelton in Little-Britaine,
